alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 30 at 12:07PM EDT until July 30 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, flooding is affecting low lying areas in and around Jackson. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 30.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 5 PM.
